Title: Excludes fundraising from consideration in appropriating state aid and reimbursement for services to volunteer ambulance companies
Summary: Excludes fundraising from consideration in appropriating state aid and reimbursement for services to volunteer ambulance companies, including regional emergency medical councils.
LawCode: Add ยง3005-c, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to excluding money raised by fundraising for volunteer emergency medical services when allocating state funding
